type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.TestTaskReports
type.description: The reports produced by the Test task.

method.name: getHtml
method.description:
A HTML report indicate the results of the test execution.

returns:The HTML report

method.name: getJunitXml
method.description:
The test results in “JUnit XML” format.

returns:The test results in “JUnit XML” format

property.name: html
property.description:
A HTML report indicate the results of the test execution.

returns:The HTML report

property.name: junitXml
property.description:
The test results in “JUnit XML” format.

returns:The test results in “JUnit XML” format
